name: You're dead but a wizard, Garry!
name_original: You're dead but a wizard, Garry!
description:
It's an unfinished game for the GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam.
Maybe I'll keep working on it. It needs a lot of rework though :'D
If there is anything I can do to enhance the WebGL build, let me know!
Anyway, thanks for playing!

Controls:

Move: WASD/Arrow keys
Dash: Space (has cooldown)
Shoot: Left mouse button
Toggle map: M
Change staff: Tab (If you've found another staff, you'll start with one)
Interact: e (you'll see messages if you can interact)
